body.name: Spidey and His Amazing Friends Supersized Iron Man Action Figure, 9-Inch Avengers Action Figures, Marvel Super Hero Preschool Toys for 3+ Years

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Spidey and his Amazing Friends Store

Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 1 min
features: SUPER HERO ACTION FIGURE: Web-out with the Spidey and His Amazing Friends Supersized Iron Man Figure! This 9-inch action figure comes with a Repulsor Ray accessory for ultimate imaginative play
POSEABLE HEADS AND ARMS: The head and arms of this Iron Man toy move, so preschoolers can move him into dynamic action poses that recreate the excitement of the TV show
ATTACHABLE ACCESSORY: Kids can attach the included Repulsor Ray accessory to the Iron Man figure’s wrist so they can imagine him saving the day, just like in the preschool show on Disney Junior
GREAT GIFT FOR SUPER HERO FANS: These preschool Marvel action figures make awesome holiday or birthday gifts for 3 year old boys and girls and up who love Super Hero toys
LOOK FOR OTHER MARVEL TOYS: Look for Supersized Spidey and Supersized Miles Morales: Spider-Man toys (each sold separately, subject to availability) for even more Spidey Team fun
body.description: Iron Man to the rescue! This Spidey and His Amazing Friends Supersized Iron Man action figure is made for big imaginations. At 9 inches tall, this large-scale, poseable Super Hero figure is big, friendly, and ready to play! Kids can attach the included Repulsor Ray accessory to the figure’s wrist and move the Iron Man figure’s head and arms into fun action poses to recreate favorite scenes from the preschool Marvel animated show on Disney Junior. Look for Supersized Spidey and Supersized Miles Morales: Spider-Man action figures (each sold separately, subject to availability) for more Spidey fun! These Spidey and His Amazing Friends toys make great gifts for boys and girls who love Super Hero adventures. Add these Iron Man toys for 3 year old boys and girls and up to your Marvel collection. Copyright MARVEL. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a 3year old boy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son, and it is a great size for a 3 year old. He was excited to carry it around with himself and great to toss in the backpack while you are out. It’s sturdy and catches the eye of a toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iron Man Fan
reviews.reviewText: This toy is absolutely adorable and exactly as described! My grandson loves playing with it along with an action hero house his auntie designed for him. It was the perfect Christmas gift for him!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for price
reviews.reviewText: Paid right around $10 for it. It's about a foot tall and looks just like the character from the show. My son loves it. Good price for what it is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3 & 5 year old son for Christmas! I wanted a different toy and so I was looking at action figures. They LOVE Spiderman and when I saw the Spiderman and friends characters for 12 inches I grabbed them all. I was originally looking at the older kiddo action figures that are scarier so this was perfect for my kids ages. The size is perfect so I don’t have to worry about choking hazards too. I’m hoping they come out with a doc ock and other villains like Rhino before Christmas I cannot wait for them to open them on Christmas morning. They are going to be so excited!!! The colors are bright and match the tv show Spiderman and friends perfectly. I don’t know about performance yet as we are waiting until Christmas to open them but I scanned it over as best as I could without opening it and didn’t see any damages. Im excited for my boys to play with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Serves its purpose
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this toy, but does get frustrated that the water piece won’t stay in Iron Man’s hand very well. Keeps falling out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replacement arrived in good condition.
reviews.reviewText: Will be giving it as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my 3-4 yr old
reviews.reviewText: It’s great - its chunky and big for his hands and he seems to like that a lot. Carries it around everywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It doesn’t come wrapped properly
reviews.reviewText: I like that is came intact. I don’t like it came none bubble wrapped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fabulous robust toy. Son takes it everywhere, even swimming. Quality is top.

Proprio come nel cartone animato, i bambini ne vanno pazzi, fatti molto bene, non hanno pezzi piccoli che si possono staccare e quindi paura che lo possano ingerire. Materiale molto resistente e ottimo prezzo rispetto ai negozi fisici
